question_text: Which advantage do layer 3 switches provide over traditional routers in high-performance enterprise networks?
answer_options: Routing decisions are made in hardware for faster performance
They eliminate the need for VLANs
They replace patch panels in wiring closets
correct_answer: Routing decisions are made in hardware for faster performance
explanation: Layer 3 switches use hardware ASICs to route traffic at much higher speeds than traditional software-based routers.
